spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatch: the kitchen is not placed as in the 2D plan (plan shows kitchen on the left side adjacent to bath/closet; 3D places a full kitchen run on the right wall near the Chandler/Joey door and also shows an additional/duplicated counter run near the dining area). Exterior wall stepping/jogs on the left side are simplified, altering room footprints. Several door locations/swing orientations are approximate rather than matching the plan precisely. Windows do not match the plan (extra windows added on the south/west exterior; Monica bedroom window on the east wall appears missing). Room proportions are distorted by the simplified outer shell and shifted kitchen.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships are violated by relocating/duplicating the kitchen (kitchen should adjoin the bath/coat zone and left wall geometry as drawn). At least one required opening (Monica bedroom exterior window) is missing, while additional exterior windows are hallucinated. The left-side stepped boundary present in the 2D plan is not faithfully reproduced in 3D, changing wall alignments and implied wall lengths. Door embedding is inconsistent (some openings appear as arched/rounded cutouts not consistent with the plan’s standard hinged doors).

furniture_mapping.notes: Living room seating roughly matches the general intent (sofa area and coffee table), but the kitchen cabinetry/appliances are not mapped to the 2D plan and appear duplicated. Bedroom furniture orientation/placement is not reliably consistent with the 2D plan (notably Rachel’s bedroom arrangement). Scale is stylized and not clearly dimension-faithful.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric with good lighting and generally neat geometry. However, several openings use stylized rounded cutouts and simplified massing that reduce technical clarity versus an orthographic-faithful architectural model. Overall composition is strong despite plan inaccuracies.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen is misplaced: 2D plan kitchen is on the left adjacent to bath/closet; 3D shows a primary kitchen run on the right wall near the Chandler & Joey door.

Hallucinated/duplicated kitchen elements: 3D includes both a right-wall full kitchen (fridge/sink/cabinets) and an additional counter run near the dining area that does not match the single kitchen footprint in the plan.
Exterior wall geometry/proportions distorted: left-side stepped/jogged boundary in the 2D plan is simplified in 3D, altering room footprints and wall lengths.
Window placement mismatch: 3D adds extra exterior windows on the south/west wall area that are not indicated in the 2D plan.
Missing window: Monica’s bedroom exterior window on the east wall shown in the 2D plan is not present in the 3D render.
Door style/orientation inconsistency: several openings in 3D appear as rounded/arched cutouts and/or hinge swings that do not match the plan’s hinged door conventions and placements.
Furniture layout mismatch in bedrooms: bed orientation/placement (notably Rachel’s bedroom) does not clearly follow the 2D plan arrangement.
